column1: The Pit Room////There are sooooo many BBQ places to try in Houston. But
column2: a friend suggested The Pit Room as one of her faves. Wow wow wow!! This is the best BBQ I have ever had (except for family's BBQ)!! Seriously! Look at the bark and that smoke ring! Everything I ate was delicious! I had (pictured) the 2 meat dinner (2 meats
column4: BBQ sauce on the side and a slice of white bread): mustard potato salad
column6: brisket and venison sausage. The brisket is phenomenal
column7: and that venison sausage thoooooo!!! The line is long
